# Epi table
```{r,echo=F}

#Function to transform numeric to categorical variable

rndr <- function(x, ...) {
    if (is.factor(x) || is.character(x)) {
        c(render.default(x, ...), c(`Overall N`=sum(!is.na(x))))
    } else {
        render.default(x, ...)
    }
}


table1(~  age +  gender + parasitemia + median_coi + DHA+ 
         Lumefantrine + Mefloquine + MDAQ + chloroquine +
        piperaquine + country 
     , data = IC50_genotype,render.continuous = c("Median [Q1, Q3]") )




```
```{r, echo=FALSE}
COI_cat<- IC50_genotype%>%
  dplyr::select(median_coi) %>%
  mutate(coi_cat = ifelse(median_coi>1, "1+", "1")) 

table1(~  coi_cat 
     , data = COI_cat,render.continuous = c("Median [Q1, Q3]") )
```

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
ranking_country <- IC50_genotype %>%
  group_by(country) %>%
  summarise(n = n()) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  mutate(freq = n/sum(n)) %>%
  arrange(desc(freq))

write.csv(ranking_country, "tables/ranking_country.csv", row.names = F)

```


Countries with frequency >0.03%
```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}

top_countries <- IC50_genotype %>%
  rename(admin = country) %>%
  group_by(admin) %>%
  summarise(n = n()) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  mutate(Frequency = n/sum(n)) %>%
   arrange(desc(Frequency)) %>%
    filter(Frequency>=0.003) 


africa <- ne_countries(scale="medium", type = "sovereignty", continent = "Africa", returnclass = "sf", )

top_countries_map<- africa %>%
  dplyr::right_join(top_countries, by = "admin")



# Africa vs Top countries Map


colors <- c("#FFFFFF","#FFFF33", "#FF8000", "#FF0000", "#990000")
            


country_map<- ggplot() + 
  geom_sf(data=africa, fill="gray90")+
  geom_sf(data = top_countries_map, aes(fill= n), 
          colour = "black") +
  scale_fill_stepsn(colors = colors, 
                    breaks = c(3,20,50,100),
                    labels = c("3-20","21-50","51-100", "100+"),
                    values = scales::rescale(c(3,20,50,100)),
                    name = "Number of isolates") +
  theme_nothing() +  
  theme(legend.position = c(.2,.4)) 
 
print(country_map)
ggsave("figures/country_map.pdf", units="cm", width=19, height=15, dpi=300)

```

### Years in CNR database
```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
ranking_year <- IC50_genotype %>%
  group_by(year) %>%
  summarise(n = n()) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  mutate(freq = n/sum(n)) %>%
  arrange(desc(freq))

year_plot<- ranking_year %>%
  mutate(year = as.factor(year)) %>%
ggplot(aes(year, n)) + 
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  ggtitle("") + 
  ylab("Number of isolates") +
  xlab("year") + 
  scale_x_discrete( breaks=c("2016","2017", "2017","2018","2019","2020", "2021", "2022","2023"),
                    labels=c("2016","2017", "2017","2018","2019","2020", "2021", "2022","2023")) + ylim(0, 200) +
  theme_classic(base_size = 12) +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle=0, vjust=0.5, size = 6) )

print(year_plot)
ggsave("figures/year_plot.pdf", units="cm", width=6, height=6.5, dpi=300)

```

#Distribution of countries by region in 2016-18 versus 2019-23
```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}

WAF_CAF_class<- read.csv(here("raw_data", "Countries_rank.csv")) %>%
  filter(region =="WAF" |region =="CAF") %>% 
  rename(country = Visited.country) 

write_rds(WAF_CAF_class,"intermediate_data/WAF_CAF_class.rds", "xz")

WAF_CAF_class %>%
  group_by(region) %>%
  reframe(sum(n))


##################################################
#                                                #
# WAF AND CAF REGIONS STRATIFIED BY TIME PERIOD  #
#                                                #
##################################################

WAF_CAF_countries_before2019_after2019<- IC50_genotype %>%
  dplyr::select(sample, country, year,Lumefantrine,DHA,Mefloquine,MDAQ,
                chloroquine,piperaquine) %>%
   inner_join(WAF_CAF_class %>% dplyr::select(country,region), by = c("country")) %>%
  mutate( year = ifelse(year<=2018, "2016-18","2019-23"))
  
WAF_CAF_countries_year_table<- table1(~  region | year
     , data = WAF_CAF_countries_before2019_after2019)

write.csv(WAF_CAF_countries_year_table, "tables/WAF_CAF_countries_year_table.csv", row.names = F)

```

```{r,echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
WAF_CAF_countries_year_stats<- CreateTableOne(vars = c("region"), strata = "year", data = WAF_CAF_countries_before2019_after2019)

print(WAF_CAF_countries_year_stats,showAllLevels = TRUE,
      nonnormal = TRUE  )
```
